Description: DJ GEAR INSTRUMENT GEAR LIVE SOUND RECORDING MICROPHONES HEADPHONES ACCESSORIES SOFTWARE LIGHTING BUNDLES Authorized Dealer ESP LTD EC-1000VB Used 6-String Electric Guitar in Vintage Black - Used - Description Pick up the ESP LTD Deluxe EC-1000 Electric Guitar and you'll believe this lightweight beauty can do it all. It's purposefully built for maximum crunch with its mahogany body, set mahogany 24-3/4"-scale neck, and rosewood fretboard (ebony on vintage black). Abalone flags plus the model name at the 12th fret give it distinction. The TonePros locking bridge and tailpiece keep tuning rock-solid. It features a maple top and a pair of sports a Seymour Duncan JB/59 passive pickup setup. See-thru colors all have quilted maple tops. Features/Specs Resonant mahogany body with set mahogany neck Comfortable Thin U neck contour with 24 extra-jumbo frets Seymour Duncan JB/59 set on amber sunburst model Precision ESP locking tuners Fully-adjustable TonePros locking tune-o-matic bridge Case sold separately We are authorized dealers for all these brands.
